column1: # ROR Schema v2.1 to Schema.org SSSOM Mapping
# mapping_set_title: ROR Schema v2.1 to Schema.org Mapping
# mapping_set_description: Comprehensive mappings between Research Organization Registry schema v2.1 fields and Schema.org properties, based on actual JSON schema definitions

column6: mapping_justification
column9: comment

column6: Related mapping - status as structured property with name-value pair
column9: PropertyValue with name='registryStatus' and value from ROR enum (active, inactive, withdrawn)

column6: Type-safe semantic preservation via PropertyValue structure
column9: Numerical year preserved in PropertyValue due to ROR number type vs Schema.org Date type incompatibility

column6: Exact mapping - registered domains as structured institutional metadata
column9: Array of domain names preserved in PropertyValue structure for institutional identification

column6: Semantic equivalence - contains the actual name text content
column9: All name values are the primary text strings for organizational names

column6: Related mapping - canonical display name when different from primary value
column9: ror_display is schema:name when it represents the preferred display form; schema:alternateName otherwise

column6: Semantic equivalence - official organizational designation
column9: label typically represents the official/legal name of the organization

column6: Semantic equivalence - organizational aliases and alternate forms
column9: alias directly corresponds to alternate name variants

column6: Semantic equivalence - acronyms as alternate name forms
column9: acronyms function as abbreviated alternate names

column6: Related mapping - language metadata as structured property
column9: ISO 639-1 language codes preserved in StructuredValue.inLanguage.alternateName when using multilingual additionalProperty approach

column6: Narrow mapping - ROR focuses on research organizations
column9: All ROR records represent research-related organizations

column6: Broad mapping - all ROR records are organizations
column9: ROR records inherit from Organization class

column6: Semantic equivalence - both represent unique persistent identifiers
column9: ROR ID is a persistent identifier following pattern ^https://ror.org/0[a-z|0-9]{8}$

column6: Related mapping - admin metadata similar to creative work metadata
column9: Administrative metadata for ROR record management

column6: Semantic equivalence - record creation information
column9: When ROR record was created

column6: Semantic equivalence - specific creation date
column9: ISO date format for record creation

column6: Related mapping - schema version at creation
column9: Schema version when record was created (1.0, 2.0, 2.1)

column6: Semantic equivalence - record modification information
column9: When ROR record was last modified

column6: Semantic equivalence - specific modification date
column9: ISO date format for record modification

column6: Related mapping - schema version at modification
column9: Schema version when record was last modified

column6: Close mapping - organizational type categorization alignment
column9: ROR provides specific organizational categorization

column6: Narrow mapping - education type to specific schema.org class
column9: Direct correspondence for educational institutions

column6: Semantic equivalence - both represent funding organizations
column9: New in v2.0 - explicitly identifies funding agencies

column6: Narrow mapping - healthcare to medical organization
column9: Healthcare organizations map to medical organizations

column6: Narrow mapping - company to corporation
column9: Commercial organizations map to corporations

column6: Narrow mapping - direct correspondence for archives
column9: Archives and archival organizations

column6: Narrow mapping - nonprofit to non-governmental organization
column9: Nonprofit organizations typically map to NGOs

column6: Narrow mapping - direct correspondence for government entities
column9: Government organizations and agencies

column6: Narrow mapping - research facilities to research organizations
column9: Research facilities and infrastructures

column6: Broad mapping - generic other type to base organization class
column9: Catch-all for organizations not fitting specific categories

column6: Semantic equivalence - location information maps to addresses
column9: Array of location objects with geographic details

column6: Related mapping - geographic identifier for location
column9: Integer identifier referencing GeoNames database

column6: Semantic equivalence - detailed geographic information
column9: Nested object containing location metadata

column6: Semantic equivalence - location name to locality
column9: Name of the geographic location

column6: Semantic equivalence - direct correspondence for coordinates
column9: Decimal latitude coordinate

column6: Semantic equivalence - direct correspondence for coordinates
column9: Decimal longitude coordinate

column6: Related mapping - continent as broader geographic region
column9: Two-letter continent codes (AF, AN, AS, EU, NA, OC, SA) - new in v2.1

column6: Related mapping - continent name as geographic region
column9: Continent names (Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Europe, etc.) - new in v2.1

column6: Semantic equivalence - ISO country code
column9: Two-letter ISO country codes

column6: Semantic equivalence - country name
column9: Full country names

column6: Semantic equivalence - state/province code
column9: 1-3 character subdivision codes - new in v2.1

column6: Semantic equivalence - state/province name
column9: State, province, or region names - new in v2.1

column6: Semantic equivalence - external links and websites
column9: Array of link objects with type and value

column6: Related mapping - link types provide context
column9: Enum values: website, wikipedia

column6: Semantic equivalence - actual URL string
column9: URL string value for the link

column6: Semantic equivalence - external IDs indicate same entity
column9: Array of external identifier objects

column6: Related mapping - identifier type provides context
column9: Enum values: fundref, grid, isni, wikidata

column6: Semantic equivalence - all IDs for same entity
column9: Array of all identifiers of this type

column6: Semantic equivalence - preferred identifier for cross-reference
column9: Preferred identifier when multiple exist

column6: Related mapping - organizational relationships
column9: Array of relationship objects to other organizations

column6: Related mapping - parent relationship type
column9: Enum: related, parent, child, successor, predecessor

column6: Semantic equivalence - direct parent relationship
column9: Organization has parent organization

column6: Semantic equivalence - direct child relationship
column9: Organization has child/subsidiary organization

column6: Related mapping - general organizational affiliation
column9: Related but not hierarchical relationship

column6: Related mapping - succession indicates replacement
column9: Organization succeeded by another organization

column6: Related mapping - predecessor indicates being replaced
column9: Organization preceded by another organization

column6: Semantic equivalence - identifier of related organization
column9: ROR ID of related organization

column6: Semantic equivalence - name of related organization
column9: Display name of related organization
